thread.title: G&D Integrated Selected By Keystone Steel & Wire To Provide Supply Chain & Logistics Services
thread.title_full: G&D Integrated Selected By Keystone Steel & Wire To Provide Supply Chain & Logistics Services - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: G&D Integrated Selected By Keystone Steel & Wire To Provide Supply Chain & Logistics Services
text:
G&D Integrated
NAPERVILLE, Ill. , Sept. 11, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- G&D Integrated, a specialized provider of transportation and logistics services, announced today that it has been selected by Keystone Steel & Wire to handle their warehousing and vendor managed inventory services in the Southeast and Midwest regions of the United States .
The partnership emphasizes the value of G&D's ability to provide the systems, expertise and locations required to implement effective warehousing solutions. Keystone is one of the largest wire mills in the world and required greater visibility of their inventory as well as on-time delivery to their customers.
"After looking at all the options, we chose G&D Integrated because they have the ability to manage every detail of KSW's supply chain for precise accounting of our inventory and delivery requirements. We are confident that G&D understands the complexities of our needs and has the experience and depth to fulfill those demands," said Todd Mowbray , senior purchasing agent at Keystone Steel & Wire.
"Our new customer win with KSW further demonstrates how we collaborate with our customers to fully understand their logistics needs and challenges so we can offer the best possible solutions," commented Mark London , vice president of sales and marketing at G&D Integrated.
ABOUT G&D INTEGRATED
G&D Integrated is a specialized provider of transportation and logistics services and has over 100 years of experience advancing innovative global supply chain solutions. Headquartered in Morton, IL , the company provides domestic transportation, contract logistics, and supply chain services to a variety of industries and employs 1,000 employees at over 20 facilities across North America . For more information, visit www.gdintegrated.com .
ABOUT KEYSTONE STEEL & WIRE
Keystone Steel & Wire Company is one of the largest wire mills in the world and produces American-made steel fabricated wire products for industrial and agricultural applications. Founded in 1889, the company is located in Peoria, Illinois and is part of Contran Corporation. For more information visit www.keystoneconsolidated.com .
